author: Staff Reporter
text:
A walkathon will be organised by the district administration on Sunday to emphasis on clean elections as part of the Systematic Voters Education and Electoral Participation (SVEEP).

The walkathon will commence at R.V. Government Boys Higher Secondary School ground here, and will proceed via Rayakottai Road, MG Road, Sericulture office, Thaly Road, Ramanaykkan Lake, Sub Collector’s office, Government Hospital Road, Anna statue to Taluk office road and will conclude at the school grounds.

Ethical voting

The 4-kilometer walkathon will create awareness on voting ethically as a right and duty of a citizen. The walkathon would drive home the message of voting and voting with a conscience.

The walkathon is being jointly organised by the administration with the support and participation of civil society groups and local industries. It will commence at 6 a.m. and will be signed off with a ‘selfie’ contest by the proud finishers.
title: Walkathon to create awareness on voting rights
